title: Worldsy
subtitle: Event Based News Aggregator (on pause)

images.alt: A representation of a map as a background with teh Worldsy wordmark logo on top.
Side view of the desk organizer
Side view of the desk organizer

steps: Step 1: Design the organizer using 3D modeling software.
Step 2: Prepare the 3D printer with the appropriate material.
Step 3: Print the organizer and wait for it to cool.
Step 4: Assemble the printed parts into the final desk organizer.
textContent: This project demonstrates how to create a desk organizer using a 3D printer. It includes designing the object, selecting materials, and assembling the final piece.
description: This 3D printed desk organizer helps you keep your office space neat and tidy. It's customizable and easy to print using any standard 3D printer.
